net.sf.JRecord.Numeric

Class ConversionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.Numeric.ConversionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractManager

    public class ConversionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements AbstractManager
    This class will store all Cobol Numeric Type Converters. A converter should convert a cobol numeric type (as defined in the copybook) into a JRecord Type identifier
    Author:
    Bruce Martin
